mapper.insert: insert into store (name, description, address, phone, avg_price, sale_from, sale_to, category, user_id) values (#{store.name}, #{store.description}, #{store.address}, #{store.phone}, #{store.avgPrice}, #{store.saleFrom}, #{store.saleTo}, #{store.category}, #{store.user.userId})
mapper.update: update store set logo = #{logo} where store_id = #{store_id}
mapper.select: select s.store_id, s.name, s.logo, s.description, s.address, s.phone, s.avg_price, s.sale_from, date_format(s.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%m') as created_at, s.sale_to, s.category, u.user_id, u.username, u.phone from store s, user u where s.user_id = #{user_id} and s.user_id = u.user_id limit 1
